      • addPartSaveSelected

        public void addPartSaveSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Selecting this will add the Part to the Inventory, and switch screens to the Main Form screen
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to initiate the save method in the Add Part screen
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when criteria has not been met to fulfil all requirements to create a new Part

      • addPartCancelSelected

        public void addPartCancelSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Selecting this will erase the input fields, and switch screens to the Main Form screen
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to opt out of creating a new Part, and switch screens back to the Main Form
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addPartInHouseToggled

        public void addPartInHouseToggled​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Selecting this will ensure the part is associated with the InHouse parts
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to switch the flex label to 'Machine ID'

      • addPartOutsourceToggled

        public void addPartOutsourceToggled​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Selecting this will ensure the part is associated with the Outsourced parts
        Parameters:
        event - variable created to switch the flex label to 'Company Name'
